primos.primos_to_all: {amount} primogems given to all players successfully
primos.must_be_number: The amount of primogems must be a number!
primos.user_not_found: This user is not found in the game!

ban.ban_user: This person did something terrible and was banned
ban.unban_user: This person became cool again and was unbanned
ban.not_banned_user: This person is not banned, luckily

banners.selected_unknown:
This banner does not exist!
These options are available: novice, event, event 2, standard, weapon

shop.buy_confirmation:
You have purchased {amount} {wish_type} wishes for {pay_count} primogems!
Your balance: {current_balance}
shop.too_big_value: You cannot buy this much at once!
shop.not_enough_primos: You don't have enough primogems, {amount} wishes cost {pay_count} primogems!
shop.not_enough_primos_tip: You can also use "!купить молитвы все <тип молитвы>" to buy wishes for all your Primogems!

casino.lost: {results}💀 Tough luck, you lost all your primogems! Maybe next time...
casino.minimum_error: Hey, what's the matter? You must bet at least 50 primogems
casino.maximum_error: You can't bet that much, or you'll end up broke!
casino.unknown_color: That color doesn't exist! The only options are: {colors_types}

avatars.empty_rarity: You don't have any {rarity} rarity characters yet!
avatars.empty: You don't have any characters yet! You can obtain them through banners
avatars.unknown: You haven't obtained this character yet / it doesn't exist!

reward_answers:
You woke up and found {amount} primogems on your desk! 
I wonder how they got there?
You went outside and found {amount} primogems on the ground
Some hilichurl found {amount} primogems, and you "borrowed" them from him
no_reward_answers: No luck today, you didn't find any primogems...
On your way home, you dropped all the primogems you found in the river...
daily_rewards.already_used: You have already tried to find primogems today, try again tomorrow!

fun.regex_long_waiting: Searching using regular expressions can take a while, please wait...
fun.maximum_phrases_exceeded: You can only search for more than 10 random phrases in a private message!

gacha_history.no_rolls_found: You haven't obtained anything in the banner you selected yet!
gacha_history.no_future_items: You can't see what you'll get in the future!
gacha_history.history_exceeded: You didn't obtain anything at this time!

genshin_info.uid_not_set: You haven't set your UID yet! You can set it using the command "!set uid <UID>"
genshin_info.replier_no_uid: The person you replied to has not created an account/has not set their UID yet, but they can do so by typing "!set uid <UID>"
genshin_info.enka_network_error:
It looks like enka.network is currently down!
If this isn't the case, please let me know [id322615766|here]
genshin_info.current_account_deleted:
Uh... I couldn't find any information on this UID, it seems this Genshin account was banned/deleted
(or it's an enka.network error)
genshin_info.uid_not_found: There is no player with that UID!
genshin_info.no_avatar_profile_picture: No character on pfp (how is that possible?)
genshin_info.only_caller_build: Nope! Only caller may see the build of this player
genshin_info.get_build_error: Something went wrong while getting information about this character
genshin_info.detailed_info_disabled: У этого игрока отключены подробные детали персонажей
genshin_info.avatar_removed_from_stand: This character is not on showcase anymore!

invite_help.read_right: Now I need to be given read message permissions and admin rights for correct operation!
invite_help.help_commands:
Main commands:
!начать - create a profile
!перс - view character
!установить ник [никнейм] - sets a nickname for your character
invite_help.help_repository: All other commands can be viewed in the repository:
invite_help.private_start:
To work correctly, you need to add me to any conversation and grant me access to the messages!
Commands can be viewed here:

leave.warning:
Are you sure you want to delete your account?
After this, your account will be deleted forever.
Write "!точно удалить геншин" to delete the account
leave.confirmed: You have left the best bot in the entire Discord...

like_reward.on_like:
{mention}, thank you for liking the post {link}
For this you get 50 primogems! ❀
like_reward.on_like_rare:
aww, {mention}, t-thank you for a l-like on the post {link}, it m-makes me so happy... ahh~... 
for this i'll g-give you... 50 primogems!! enjoy, cutie :3

minigames.start: You have started to complete the assignments. Come back in {time} minute{ending}!
minigames.already_started: You have already started or completed the assignments!
minigames.end: Today, Katerina paid you a bonus of {primogems_reward} primogems and {experience_reward} experience!
minigames.not_started: You have not started or have already completed the assignments!
minigames.time_left: You can only complete the assignments in {ending}!

nickname.dot_found: В нике не может быть точка!
nickname.length_exceeded: В нике не может быть больше 35 символов (включая пробел)
nickname.swear_ban:
Вы были забанены в группе.
Для разбана, напишите [id322615766|мне в личные сообщения]
nickname.ban_error: А, ещё, просьба к администратору беседы - выдайте мне пожалуйста админку, что бы я мог нормально работать (точно никак не связано с предыдущими событиями)

promocodes.same_author: Пока мы живем в 2023, этот человек живет в 2032 (Вы владелец этого промокода)
promocodes.user_already_redeemed: Вы можете использовать только 1 промокод игрока
promocodes.promocode_author_deleted: Автор этого промокода - ишак, который удалил свой аккаунт из всех бесед
promocodes.promocode_author_reward: [id{author}|{nickname_author}], [id{from_id}|этот игрок] актививировал ваш промокод, вы получили 4800 примогемов!
promocodes.promocode_redeemer_reward:
Вы успешно активировали промокод игрока [id{author}|{nickname_author}]!
За это вы получаете 800 примогемов
promocodes.share_promocode: Поделитесь им с друзьями, что бы они могли его использовать!
promocodes.share_promocode_reward: За каждого приглашенного человека вы получите 4800 примогемов (30 круток)

set_uid.enka_network_error:
